bwwExcerpt: Saddled with an unmemorable score by Stephen Schwartz (Wicked, Pippin) and a confused book by Lindsey Ferrentino (Amy and the Orphans), Versailles glides by as bland bio-musical for much of its excessive runtime, the showâ€™s perspective on Siegel meandering confusedly between misplaced sympathy and perverse fascination.
